oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man, who has missed his aim in shooting, throws springbok bones, in order that another man may do likewise. (L VIII.-11. 7010 rev., note). !hau-!hau is a charm made so that a man may make another miss his aim on the hunting-ground. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-11.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Explanation of !hau-!hau (a hunting charm)
